name: retrogen-template
description: Utilities for collecting public information about the public Twilio GitHub organizations

scripts.retros: npm run retro:twilio && npm run retro:twilio-labs && npm run retro:twilio-samples
scripts.convert:contributors: npm run convert:contributors:twilio && npm run convert:contributors:twilio-labs && npm run convert:contributors:twilio-samples

author: Tierney Cyren <tcyren@twilio.com> (https://twilio.com)
